events.message: I received the wrong size for my recent order and I would like to request a refund because the product does not fit and is unusable for me.
The system has categorized this customer issue under the Refund cluster based on keywords like refund and order problem.
Assigning the case to agent Sarah T. who handles refund requests for size or product mismatch issues.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund because you received the wrong size. I’m here to help you with this.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product label so we can verify the mistake and process your refund quickly?
My order number is 4578921. I’ve attached a photo of the label on the item showing the size is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund process right away. Please return the product using the prepaid shipping label we will send shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate how fast you handled my refund request.
We have successfully processed your refund request. You will receive the money back within 5-7 business days after we receive the returned product.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund as expected. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since your refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting our support team.
